home.parrafo-info: I am a Backend developer with expertise in Java and knowledge of Spring Boot and MySQL databases. I am passionate about programming and problem-solving, seeking opportunities to apply my skills in a professional environment. My focus lies in developing efficient, reliable, and scalable Backend applications.

proyectos.title: Projects
proyectos.info-proyecto1: game in which the user must guess a secret word in a limited number of attempts. The word is randomly selected by the program and the user will lose the game if the gallows image is completed.
proyectos.info-proyecto2: My personal web portfolio, where you can find some of my most outstanding projects, my technical skills and a little about my training.
proyectos.info-proyecto3: An encryptor where the user can write a text and the encryptor encodes it with already programmed keys. The encryptor also allows you to decrypt the text.
